author: Staff Reporter
text: British Council on Saturday conducted the Education UK exhibition at The Residency. According to Snit Koli, Head, Operations, All India, 18 institutions from across the U.K. had participated in the fair. Last year 14 institutions had stalls at the fair. The increase in participation reflects the response from Coimbatore and also Hyderabad, Kochi and a few other cities, where the British Council is holding the fair this month.
title: Education UK exhibition held
